page.title: 08ST.MARY'S P.S.
page.content: Our school was built in 1968. The school is built of brick and has four classrooms,six stores,one staffroom and one kitchen. The name of the school is St. Mary's Primary School Ballygawley. The address is 2. Whitebridge Rd. Ballygawley. There are 98 pupils at the school. Our headmaster is Master Mc Garvey. There are 7 classes. We have a computer.It is a BBC computer. We start school at 9.15am and the bell rings at 3.15pm for hometime. There are more boys than girls at the school. The starting age is either 4 or 5. Master Fox, Master Kelly and Master Gallagher were headmaster before Master Mc Garvey. We haven't a football pitch.There are four teachers ,two ladies and two men. The three assistant teachers are Mrs.Evans,Mrs.Kelly and Mr.McRory.
